title: Samsung might deliver its first look at Android 13 and One UI 5.0 as soon as July
content:
Samsung has done a great job speeding up the release of new Android versions of its flagship phones, and it seems things are scheduled to kick off even faster with the launch of Android 13.

moreâ€¦

The post Samsung might deliver its first look at Android 13 and One UI 5.0 as soon as July appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, Samsung is scheduled to release Android 13 and One UI 5.0 in beta sometime around July of this year.
